attributes.action: Request that all schools have the benifit of 20mph speed limit outside of the school frontage
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many local Councils take the safety of young people and those visiting schools seriously. However many such as Wiltshire County Council fail to listen to the wishes of local residents and fail to put safety first.
It should be a standard requirement that all schools should have the benifit of such speed limits funded by the goverment.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
